short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chargezoom is an embedded payment terminal that enhances the productivity and functionality of QuickBooks Online.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Email or text payment links directly from QuickBooks Online using virtually ANY payment processor.

Chargezoom helps QuickBooks Online users save money by embedding their preferred payment processor. Get better credit card processing rates without leaving QuickBooks or changing existing processes.

ðŸ•” Save Time
Provide multiple frictionless payment options and a 24x7 self-service Customer Portal. All payments reconcile to Invoices following GAAP standards. No more chasing payments, manual process, double entry or reconciliation.

ðŸš€ Increase Cashflow 
Email or text payment links to multiple Customers and set automated reminders. Chargezoom reduce Invoice-to-cash time by 40% on average. Never stress over paying vendors or making payroll again.

Chargezoom for QuickBooks Online connects QBO to virtually any payment processor, including Stripe, PayPal, Global Payments, Fiserv and hundreds more. A Chargezoom and QuickBooks Online account are required. Don't have a Chargezoom account yet? Sign-up for just $9/mo at https://chargezoom.com
